title: Gabriel Garcia Marquez - No one writes to the Colonel and other
description:
Note: Reupload, due to circumstances.

-----------------

Title: No One Writes to the Colonel and Other Stories
Author: Gabriel Garcia Marquez
Format: .ePUB
Genre: Short Stories, Magical Realism, Fiction

Description: This stories are set in the town of Macondo. 

"These stories are told in spare, unpretentious but picturesque prose, compassionate of human frailty, but also rich in wit and irony. The characters are all too human, alternately humorous and tragic."- Library Journal

----------------

This is a completely proofread version of the book. This might not be perfect but I have tried to keep it as close to it, any mistakes on the book are mine, alone. They can also be found in the book "The Collected Stories" by Gabriel Garcia Marquez which is a part of this torrent by workerbee here: https://thepiratebay.se/torrent/10011315
